constituent: duty, Nelson, column, going, line, cruise missile, missile, wind, crotch
koohiiStory1: Japanese kamikaze pilots (and the American from Dr. Strangelove) are so devoted to their duty that they go with their missiles.
koohiiStory2: Imagine those poor saps in charge of nuclear silos, responsible for ICBMS, those towering column missiles. When the order comes they must decide whether to obey their concience or do their duty and damn the world to atomic annihilation.
myStory: chữ dịch. sai khiến, đi chiến dịch, đi thú. đi chậm mang cái thù(vũ khí: bàn và lại (nữa)).
readingExamples: 役所 (やくしょ), 役目 (やくめ), 荷役 (かやく)
words: to be useful, to be helpful, to serve the purpose
leading part, leading actor or actress
part, assigning (allotment of) parts, role, duties
